item.title: BFBC2 and AC2 connection problems
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
Kisuke Moto:

I keep having a problem with spawning. I click continue to spawn. It’ll count down to 0 and I like click the damn thing like a thousand times over just to spawn and then it’ll jump back up to 10 or 20 secs again. When I spawn finally, I then die and the same process keeps happening over and over. I’ve tried different servers but it don’t make a difference

Your AV is most likely AVG, deinstall that junk, stay away from porn sites and use common sense. That problem has been posted numerous times before and the only solution is to deinstall AVG or somehow disable it while playing BC2
(has been posted that other AV’s harm playability of BC2 so I suggest disabling every AV entirely while you play the game)

Also the thing that prevents you from playing any other game, is Port Forwarding. You can not play many games properly if your ports are closed (for example, you will constantly get kicked on BC2 because PunkBuster can not communicate with the server or the client)

Solution? Open your damn ports by finding your router model in the list below, then find the game for which you want to open ports
